knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, inlcude=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(boot)
library(nlstools)

```

```{r}

behavior <- rep(1:0, c(22,14))

prop_fun <- function (x, i) {sum(x[i])/length(x[i])}

boot_10000 <- boot(behavior, prop_fun, R = 10000)
boot_10000


```
Check the original mean in a histogram.
